text: Vera Vitalievna Glagoleva (31 January 1956 - 16 August 2017) was a Russian actress. She was born in Moscow. She was known for her roles in Christmas movies and romantic comedies. Her best known roles were in Vyyti zamuzh za kapitana, Bednaya Sasha, and in Zhenshchin obizhat ne rekomenduyetsya. Glagoleva was awarded the People's Artist of Russia in 2011. Glagoleva died in Baden-Baden, Germany on 16 August 2017 of cancer at the age of 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Russian movie actors Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Vera Glagoleva
